documents.document: @msleedy Yep. You might be angry about those things, but putting your focus to best use on one. Toblerone, I hope.
@NickMotown Please let us know if you come. x
@tanyasweeney Lovely chatting to you. Thanks for writing it.
@GrainneClear It's so ridiculous.
3: who made you the issue police? #whatabouteryispointless
2: Whatabout all the other issues YOU didn't mention, whatabouterer? Gluten. The HSE. Animal rights. Rain. #whatabouteryispointless
1: People are capable of caring (and doing things about) more than one thing, even if they're not talking about it. #whatabouteryispointless
@NickMotown We are great, thank you. You over here any time soon? A face to face is long overdue xx
Whataboutery. Is. Pointless. https://t.co/EE80OgCXwl
@alan_maguire Mine is Christmas Day. My half birthday always gets overlooked. I feel you, man. Happy Half.
@urchinette @tanyasweeney Thanks lovely. Couple of years old now, but we'll take it xx
@raycop Oh jeez, I've no idea where I'm going... ;)
Beannachtaí na Féile oraibh! We all know she's a goddess. My piece (in English) "Brigid (Not Jones's) Diary" is on… https://t.co/myrSgEgsjw
@HerstoryIreland @TG4TV @RoisinTG4 Yippee! Maith na mná xxx
Thanks Ray! Need it myself. https://t.co/89IQZOgBDW
We chatted to @tanyasweeney at the Indo about racism and that. It's in today. https://t.co/DDostm2vEO
This. Those people don't have the moral high ground, they just have their own. But still they attempt to shame. https://t.co/cKNty114uG
@Cunionsandphey @BeeNiBee @Independent_ie Oh thank goodness. Thank you xx
@ClaraRose @irishtatler Gwan you! Thanks so much for chatting to me x
Hon, Karl Geary. Hope the book flies off the shelves. https://t.co/WMnGqcY5wK
@FionaBooks @Hodges_Figgis @HarvillSecker @vintagebooks @PenguinRandomIE Thanks for having us!
My mate Karl done wrote a book. Launches tonight. Excitement. https://t.co/WMnGqcY5wK
@daytime_reverie In the greater scheme of things, it's an annoying queue, but only an annoying queue.
@FlynnUSVisaLaw Also, I think we'll be forced to be complicit. I don't think it will go anywhere.
@FlynnUSVisaLaw It'd be great if we could keep the parts that help people. But already someone was turned back here yesterday.
@FlynnUSVisaLaw It has advantages. Doesn't change that it makes us complicit in human rights breaches.
@daytime_reverie Me too. Given the alternative, don't even have to think about it!
@TomClonan @DrUmarAlQadri If he's going to go, he should make a statement. I sadly doubt he will.
@NursepollyRgn @BeeNiBee I hope with all my heart she's ok.
Please, please share. https://t.co/xyhClRMM5m
@NursepollyRgn @BeeNiBee What? My god, I didn't know.
@funnydub You will be. Brilliant. Have fun.
@funnydub You're going to be brilliant.Have a great shoot.
@rickoshea I take days away from it. It's a lot, but too important to ignore. Honestly fine if people want to unfollow/ unfriend, though.
@oceanclub @TheKavOfficial @unakavanagh @Twitter A couple of lads dog-piling me got removed, but they need stronger policies.
@oceanclub @TheKavOfficial @unakavanagh @Twitter It's hard not to draw that conclusion. Racism seems perfectly fine to them.
@TheKavOfficial @unakavanagh She's a wonderful person. And @Twitter needs to take this seriously.
@wjayawardene Feeling sick seeing politicians let pandering trump the lot.
@unakavanagh Give me a shout if you like xxx
@unakavanagh Here if you need anything. Let me know what I can do.
RIP. #annlovett #onthisday https://t.co/gQUMstAtnB
US preclearance is handy. Married to a US citizen, it makes my life easier. I like it. But I like human rights more. https://t.co/EA91N7ynKZ
@CiaraMPSI ...you're the one who wins. The trolls will do what they do anyway. Day by day, do what you need. You ROCK xxx
@CiaraMPSI I think it's a bit of both. Going off for a few days, coming back when you're up for it. But, even if you went completely...
@arshimbo I reckon he'd be pretty pissed off.
Undocumented Irish will be fine, by the way. So long as they're Christian and white. But you know that, @EndaKennyTD.
@RedtheWarrior86 Only if we met that happen.
@incogellen Hope you're alright. Fuck their whinybaby noise ❤️
@unloveablesteve I can see why people get disheartened. Totally understandable. But something's better than nothing.
@faduda Gerard, that gave me the laugh I sorely needed.
@ClaraRose @AnaCosgrave @YouTube @ava We need to meet. And plan. Love you guys.
In my @irishtatler piece for the March issue, I reflect on what Irishness means. Much as I'm doing today… https://t.co/BH0dpd9SzO
@mushypea007 There's a protest organised for Thursday, I think.
@astrantiaroma Yep. "Let our white kids in, g'wan." It's a pretty serious statement.
SIGN THE FECKING THINGS ANYWAY. Don't let "it won't work" put you off. Try something. Do something. https://t.co/sROGAjhFaV
I was kind of sick of reading milennial-bashing pieces. So I wrote this. https://t.co/Eb5J6ODqXB
"Jobs" "the economy" "tradition" "I'm not affected" "racist policies are fine" "Nazis are quite sharp dressers, whe… https://t.co/X3Pg23cXqg
And you know he won't.
@mushypea007 @EndaKennyTD That was some spectacle. And history will remember.
@mushypea007 @EndaKennyTD Sadly, it's looking that way.
"Enda should go and let Trump know what we think of his policies." But he won't. He won't.
@AndrewRalph7 But he won't, so that's moot. And I completely disagree - but disagreement's good.
@GuyLeJeune @EndaKennyTD Yes, I don't think it can even be dressed up as a shrewd business move. On a humanitarian level? Disaster.
@mushypea007 @EndaKennyTD He will not be representing many if he goes.
I mean, we all want to shift Aran jumper units, but FFS.
...or how history will view us. Or him. Please do not go to the White House on March 17 @EndaKennyTD. Make Ireland proud.
Don't think @EndaKennyTD has considered what cosying up to a fascist will do for Ireland's international reputation...
So much fun, I want to do it all again tomorrow. Thanks for having me, @24HourPlaysDub. Well done everyone. Happy b… https://t.co/QuNJDVzf87
@CiaraMPSI @unakavanagh She sure does. She's incredible xx
Hey everyone, some racists have been at @unakavanagh but she's a QUEEN. https://t.co/QSMHWWsH3o
Actors? Awake? On a Sunday? And already at @AbbeyTheatre? Must be #24hrdub Aaaargh! https://t.co/0bFmHbdtuN
Bannon and his frog babies. https://t.co/2cp2nffrrm
Rehearsing for #24hrdub in just over 7 hours. 'Night, all. Peace.
@CillianDaly @faduda @DonaldClarke63 @roisiningle Shine on, diamonds. Night night.
@CillianDaly @DonaldClarke63 @roisiningle Even if it seems futile, or silly, every obstruction or refusal to normalise is vital.
@CillianDaly @DonaldClarke63 @roisiningle Yes! There is always hope. So try mad ideas. They're not half as mad as what's happening.
@ThisIsGreels @TrishByrne Email, letters, the lot. Whatever we can think of.
@DonaldClarke63 @CillianDaly @roisiningle Either way, it's a great idea. We might have to operate beyond hope for a bit.
@DonaldClarke63 @andrewmanganVO @roisiningle US, UK, Vatican - not an arse from beyond these shores goes unlicked.
@andrewmanganVO @DonaldClarke63 @roisiningle It would be honourable and gutsy if he refused. I think he'll go. Love him to prove us wrong.
@DonaldClarke63 @roisiningle I don't think he'll refuse. Dinner long since gone 'round here in that regard. I'll still ask him not to.
@TrishByrne I'd grab onto even that like a liferaft.
@pixiesisi @YouTube I know... too apt.
@MrPaulDuane Maybe people are going to go "You know what? What do you even do?" They're sick of the disconnect.
@MrPaulDuane It can't be tackled til it's acknowledged. Hopefully that's what's happening now.
@MrPaulDuane Seeing that here, too. HSH, etc. There's a lesson in it.
@MrPaulDuane Because, as you know, I'm about on my last nerve with that bullshit. Glad you feel a little better, my friend.
@MrPaulDuane Wherever this ends, people are seeing it now. Most care. Hopefully an end to entitled, ignorant "wait and see"ers.
@MrPaulDuane I never want to underestimate those sickos. But people are great, they really are.
Obstruction and protest are love. Calling out racism is love. Taking turns to keep on keeping on is love. This is g… https://t.co/SPqzYv60ov
@clairemsb @colmtobin You care. That's a brilliant thing.
Love will get us through. Eventually. Meanwhile, love doesn't mean pretending this isn't happening, or letting it happen to others.
@colmtobin Burst into tears when I read it.
Closer to home too. Please don't stand by. Speak up. Stand up. In whatever way you feel you can. It all counts. https://t.co/88DM4iQ5wW
@CiaraMPSI That's it. But we can't. Love to you.
Now I'm getting off here for a bit. Wishing you good health, good craic, and whatever is helping you through.
A favour: please dig deeper. See what these lads are really about. It's easy to find. Not spin, not acceptable gloss but what they intend.
I'm just sad, lads. That's the truth of it.
The apologism. It's really quite strange.
"Hey, wait and see!" "Hear them out!" No thanks.
